name: Word Party
summary:
Word Party is an incredible party themed game. Use the power of words to make incredible anagrams. Use Balloons and build words!! Word Party comes with 8 different languages: English, French, Romanian, Spanish, German, Italian, Portuguese and Russian. 
Enjoy the Party!!! ;-)
